title: Genre-Based Blended Instructional Program to Improve EFL Writing Skills in Science

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific terminology and sentence structures
context.additional_context: Practical writing skills required for science managers/leaders, including work reports and research paper abstracts

learning_goals: Learners can analyze genre-specific text structures in scientific fields and explain them with 80% accuracy.
Learners can draft scientific reports using a genre-based process approach (text modeling → collaborative writing → individual writing → peer review).
Learners can revise final texts at least twice by incorporating peer feedback via digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
